channel.title: Animation
channel.description: Hi ive been codeing for awhile but i stopped and just started again and i ran into some problems. im using a delta format and my combat and death animations are all buggy it dosnt look right when they die or attack. there legs get all treatched out its realy wierd.

item.title: Animation
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:6, topic:478304”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=596499.msg4200126#msg4200126 date=1358070244]
Why was this moved to the Client Help section by a Moderator?
[/quote]

Because generally animation questions can be approached either way.[/quote]

You have a point, but they’re more involved Server-sided.

Read full topic

item.title: Animation
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Team_Rocket:

Why was this moved to the Client Help section by a Moderator?

Because generally animation questions can be approached either way.

Read full topic

item.title: Animation
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

luna-scape:

Is this when u kill certain npc’s or does this always happens. Brcause u have to add the correct animations to the npc to make it work good.

If this occurs with all N.P.C. then it is most likely either:

  1. A Client issue involving a mismatch like I posted above.

  2. The Animations not being set for any N.P.C. Server-sided

“luna-scape” is correct on their point however, as the N.P.C. must use the Animations which were created for them in order to be visually appealing.

Read full topic

item.title: Animation
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Is this when u kill certain npc’s or does this always happens. Brcause u have to add the correct animations to the npc to make it work good.

Read full topic

item.title: Animation
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Why was this moved to the Client Help section by a Moderator? Although these are stored in the Client, they can be set and assigned Server-sided. It’s possible that your Client isn’t compatible with DeltaScape in a sense, and the I.D’s are mismatched, which would lead to the problem you’re having. I recommend you try connecting from a different Client and post the results of that.

Read full topic
